Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

= the passage which leads from the back of the mouth of humans in the direction of the the lungs; ► internally, it functions as a passage way for food and breath; externally, it is a place around which ornaments can be placed; ≈ associated with food and speaking
= causative action by which humans or deities cause an event to happen with less intensity
= a musical instrument ◄ made from a ram's horn; ► sound is produced by blowing into the small end; ► used for giving signals and during festivals and celebrations
literally: to lift up (one's) voice; hence: = action by which humans speak more loudly than usual
= action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action where humans make an intensive effort to associate with a deity, to serve and worship him, and to get answers to questions
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= practices that conform to the laws of God
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to humble (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans refrain from ingesting food ► and so humiliate themselves before a deity

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
literally: to find (a certain condition); hence: = process by which humans eventually reach a certain state or condition
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

Node.gloss: dispute, quarrel, strife, argument|(law)suit, case, indictment
Node.definition: = state of opposition or hostility between two or more persons, perhaps even involving a deity
= action by which two parties are engaged in a violent struggle involving physical force

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= clenched hand; ► used in fighting

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
literally: to humble (one's) self; hence: = action by which humans refrain from ingesting food ► and so humiliate themselves before a deity
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= plant with flexible stems, growing in rivers and marshes; ◄ |iScirpus|i*; ► produces much smoke when burning and used for making ropes; ≈ associated with humility

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= a coarse dark material ◄ made of goat or camel hair; ► worn next to the skin as a sign of mourning or repentance

= powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well

Node.gloss: to lie down on sackcloth and ashes
Node.definition: literally: to lie down on sackcloth and ashes; hence: = action by which humans give expression to their grief by sleeping on sackcloth (שַׂק) and ashes (אֵפֶר)
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

= action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him
= action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

Node.gloss: to loose bonds of wickedness = to release (people) that are kept in bondage unjustly
Node.definition: literally: to loose the bonds of wickedness; hence: = action by which humans let go of an activity directed at other humans that is considered evil, ◄ as if this activity was a rope or chain by which those others were tied
literally: cords used to bind people so that they cannot freely move about; hence: = things that affect the life of a person and from which that person cannot easily free him/herself
= cord ► used to fasten one object to another
= wooden pole ► secured to the necks of animals or human beings with the help of a rope to restrict movement or to prevent escape; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression

Node.gloss: to release|to let go|to let loose|to set free
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans allow (other) humans or animals to move away freely from a place where they have been confined
= state of not being under the control of someone else
= wooden pole ► secured to the necks of animals or human beings with the help of a rope to restrict movement or to prevent escape; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general
= a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans are either without clothes or insufficiently dressed; ≈ often associated with poverty or shame
literally: to cover; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to put on clothing
a person connected by blood or marriage
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= process by which natural forces find their way by breaking through any obstacles that keep them from moving forward

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= act of restoring someone's health
= process by which an event happens without delay
= process by which a certain condition becomes a reality, ◄ as a new shoot that comes up from the ground
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= a manifestation of God, sometimes visible, either in a cloud, or looking like fire, capable of speech
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bring up the rear|to form the rear guard
Node.definition: = to march behind a group of travellers to gather the stragglers and keep the group safe from those who might attack from behind
= referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.gloss: to cry out|to cry for help
Node.definition: = action by which humans and animals raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= wooden pole ► secured to the necks of animals or human beings with the help of a rope to restrict movement or to prevent escape; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to denote oppression

Node.gloss: to stretch out (one's) hand|to stretch out (one's) right hand|to lay (one's) hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans stretch out their hand, right hand, or finger in order to do point with it or to put it in position for another action
= one of the five long and slender projections of the human hand; ► used for writing, pointing, grasping, and other activities; ≈ sometimes used metonymically to represent the entire body

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= great wickedness and depravity, as a trait of certain human beings, which is expressed in thoughts, words, and actions; ≈ regarded as unacceptable and worthy of punishment by God
= to cause someone else to have access to certain things
= condition of not having food to eat, often leading to weakness

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

Node.gloss: to be afflicted|to be bothered|to be daunted
Node.definition: literally: to be bowed down; hence: = state in which humans are suffering hardship and trouble and unable to help themselves

Node.gloss: to give (one's) fill > to make contented

Node.definition: = process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well being

= state in which there is no light, ◄ caused by the fact that the light of sun, moon, and stars cannot reach the location that is in focus, ► resulting in a state in which no one can readily see, and colors and shapes can no longer be distinguished; loved by the wicked only; ≈ associated with hardship, ignorance, death, and oblivion

= light as a physical phenomenon, mainly observed during daytime, and the opposite of darkness; ◄ one of God's most important attributes; first created by God and since produced by sun, moon, and stars, but also by fire; ► enables people and animals to see; ≈ associated with life, goodness, happiness, prosperity, security, favor, and wisdom, loved by the righteous, and hated by the wicked
= state of total absence of light; ≈ associated with suffering and lack of wisdom
= the time of the day when the sun is at its highest point
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to give (one's) fill > to make contented

Node.definition: = areas without vegetation; ≈ associated with hardship
= a living creature, including both humans and animals, as defined by the life principle that animates it
literally: bones; hence: = the physical body of a human being
= causative action by which deities cause humans to be healthy and strong
= a fenced portion of land, ► used for growing flowers, plants, and vegetables, but also as burial place; ≈ associated with beauty and fragrance
literally: the going out of water; hence: = water which flows out from an underground source
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human or deity says or reveals something that is not true
= action by which humans perform construction activities, either in order to erect a new building or to rebuild or repair an existing one
= state in which a land, building, or town has been totally destroyed, ► to the extent that nobody can live there anymore
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it; sometimes used in a somewhat figurative sense to denote the foundations of heaven and earth
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon

Node.gloss: to build a wall|to repair a wall
Node.definition: = causative action by which someone builds or repairs a wall, often made of natural stones; ≈ such a wall is sometimes used to denote integrity, which can be negatively affected by sin

= large hole in a wall, hedge, or in the ground; ► made with the purpose of entering through those holes or of making the area within it vulnerable; ≈ to have a town with a breached wall is also regarded as a deep humiliation
literally: to bring back (something into its former state); hence: = causative action by which humans restore an object to its original state
= process by which humans make a certain place or area their home
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to turn (one's) feet (from an activity); hence: = action by which humans keep themselves from engaging in a certain activity
literally: foot, here used metonymically to denote the entire person or animal owning it; hence: = a human being or animal with focus on the activities for which they use their feet

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals
literally: to cry out; hence: = action by which humans or deities assign a name to a person, place, object, or phenomenon
literally: holy; hence: = state in which people have separated themselves from others ► in order to live their life in conformity to God's commandments
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans, deities, or animals treat other humans, deities, times, or objects with honor and respect
= action by which humans, deities, or animals treat other humans, deities, times, or objects with honor and respect

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: road; hence: = pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
literally: to find (a certain condition); hence: = process by which humans eventually reach a certain state or condition
= state in which humans feel emotionally attached to a particular event

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent pointing to a specific condition or circumstance
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= causative action by which humans or deities make (other) humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה) or on a cart (עֲגָלָה)
literally: the back (of an area); hence: = the highest situated parts of a certain location, often representing the entire location

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to give to eat > to give to enjoy
Node.definition: literally: to give (goods) to eat; hence = action by which someone enables someone else to make a living off material goods until they are gone; ≈ often associated with joy

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= indirect male progenitor
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
